Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory213.png'}
{2: 'Message', 3: 'Gray Raven, here is the routine dispatch for your ground operation. We have left several supply crates on your planned route.'}
{2: 'Message', 3: "There are serums, repair kits, and spare parts in these crates. I'm sure they will be helpful in your upcoming fights."}
{2: 'Message', 3: 'Although I should end this message now with a typical "bon voyage"...'}
{2: 'Message', 3: 'I must apologize—there is an unexpected task we hope you can take on before collecting your supplies.'}
{2: 'Message', 3: "We hope you can search for a few supply crates that have landed in no man's land after veering off their original trajectory."}
{2: 'Message', 3: "While you can ignore this request, I'm afraid this is the only supply drop for this mission, so..."}
{2: 'Message', 3: '—Support Force'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory68.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "According to the coordinates we received, I believe we're near the no man's land where the supply crates landed, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hmm, those mechanoids have been staring at us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are they Corrupted?', 3: '16', 4: 'Are they residents of this place?', 5: '17'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The Punishing Virus concentration in this area is pretty minimal... And they aren't acting like Corrupted, either.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Maybe, maybe not... But we would've been warned beforehand if there were a massive horde of Corrupted in this area.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Either way, this doesn't look like a no man's land at all.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Lee is referring to the various structures before you. These buildings might see some damage here and there, but they are largely intact overall.'}
{3: 'You can even see signs of repairs done on the exterior walls.'}
{2: 'Did those mechanoids make these?', 3: '21', 4: '(Touch it)', 5: '22'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'In a way. All of these buildings are in fact holograms.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Commandant, I would refrain from doing that. They are all holograms only.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Lee points upward at the sky as he says it, and you all notice the recon drones hovering in the air.'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "They're simultaneously moving and scanning the area, all the while coordinating with each other to adjust their projections. It's quite an effective way to create a holographic environment.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Based on their scale, I'm afraid everything we're seeing here is just a projection.", 4: '3'}
{2: "Who's controlling these mechanoids?", 3: '26', 4: "Let's look for the supply crates first.", 5: '27'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I have no idea. Should we look into it, Commandant?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The situation is peculiar, but our main objective here is to retrieve the supply crates. Let's start our search as the commandant said.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'These here are a few odd fellas indeed. Stay where you are!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A voice nearby shouts at you as you are preparing to go.'}
{2: 'And you are?', 3: '30', 4: "We aren't odd!", 5: '31'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'Y\'all just gonna request a self-introduction right out of the gate, huh? I ain\'t got no name nor title, so you can just call me "Foreman" like the rest of them!', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "You're as odd as it gets here! I haven't seen any of y'all here before!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're from Babylonia, and we're here for a reason... My name is Lucia. Do you mind telling me yours?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'Hmm... A name, you say? Just call me "Foreman"! That\'s right, Foreman!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Foreman... So, are you the one who's controlling all these mechanoids?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "I'm the one asking questions here, alright? So answer me first!", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Explain yourself)', 3: '36'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: '...That means you just happened upon our place, is that so?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's right. We followed the coordinates from our Support Force here. Have you seen our supply crates?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "You can find Babylonia's logo on them. They should be quite easy to identify.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "I don't know nothing about supply crates, but we did pick up some weird boxes with strange pictures on them a while ago.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That would be what we're looking for! Where are they now?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'They\'re now rewards for the "Fist of the Taoist".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Fist of the Taoist?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'What is this "Fist of the Taoist"?', 3: '43', 4: 'But those are ours!', 5: '44'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'A competition to determine who the "Fist of the Taoist" is, obviously! Hey, seeing that y\'all are here already, do you want to give it a go?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'You should\'ve labeled them "Not Rewards for the Fist of the Taoist" then, shouldn\'t you? You want them back? Join the competition and win!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "What you're saying is... the only way we can get our supply crates back is to join this competition of yours?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "You're welcome to take them back by force, as long as you're cool with making enemies of us all.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's take the path of least resistance.", 4: 'Can you tell me more about this Fist of the Taoist?'}

{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'You should know that this is our big celebration for the yearly Ghost Festival! We mechanoids will be undergoing the trials to become a Taoist, as well as participating in a ghost-hunting competition!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I have no idea where you get all this information from, but does the title of the Fist of the Taoist mean anything special to you?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Are you teasing us about our knowledge of ghost-hunting? I'll let you know that we folks here watch Ghost Expert daily! DAILY!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Are you telling me that all the mechanoids here are fans of Ghost Expert?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'What is this Ghost Expert?', 3: '51', 4: 'Is this a fan convention?', 5: '52'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Probably a movie about this Taoist Foreman was talking about.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "T-this ain't no fan convention! It's a study group with dedicated researchers! Not fans!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So how do we participate in this competition, and how do we win?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "That's simple. First of all, you must pass the trials from our East, South, West, and North Generals, obtaining the qualification of a ghost hunter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'Afterward, you will use your qualifications to enter the four ghost-hunting venues we set up according to their order and hunt some ghosts!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'The first one who goes through all four venues is the real Fist of the Taoist!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We will get our supply crates back after we become the Taoist, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "You don't get them back—you're rewarded with them!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Speed is of the essence, then. In that case, we shouldn't waste any more time, Commandant. Let's go.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Not a timer...', 3: '60', 4: "Right, let's go get our supplies.", 5: '60'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Foreman', 3: 'Brilliant! Here come four more contestants! Good luck!', 4: '1'}
